mapper.select: SELECT xt_script.`xt_script_id`, xt_script.`xt_script_key`, xt_script.`xt_script_text`, xt_script.`xt_script_type`, xt_script.`xt_script_status`, xt_script.`xt_script_ctime`, xt_script.`xt_script_mtime`, xt_script.`xt_userinfo_id`, xt_script.`xt_script_title`, xt_script.`xt_script_content`, xt_script.`xt_script_search_filed`, xt_userinfo.`xt_userinfo_realName`, xt_script.`xt_script_valuefield`, xt_script.`xt_script_displayfield` FROM xt_script xt_script LEFT JOIN xt_userinfo AS xt_userinfo ON xt_script.xt_userinfo_id = xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_id WHERE xt_script.xt_script_id=#{xt_script_id}
